spirit:component.spirit:name: Uart

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: APB_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: APB_Slave AMBA3 Advanced Peripheral Bus (APB) Slave Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: RESET_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: RESET_Slave ARM RESET Slave Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt0_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt0_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt1_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt1_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt2_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt2_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt3_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt3_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt4_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt4_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: Interrupt5_Master
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: Interrupt5_Master ARM Interrupt Master Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: DFTInterface0_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DFTInterface0_Slave ARM Design For Test Slave Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: DFTInterface1_Slave
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DFTInterface1_Slave ARM Design For Test Slave Interface to the PL011 UART Peripheral.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive(read)/Transmit(write) data character

spirit:field.spirit:name: FE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the received character did not have a valid stop bit

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_STOP_BIT_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Framing Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the received character did not have a valid stop bit

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_STOP_BIT_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Framing Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the received character did not have a valid stop bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: PE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the parity of the received character does not match the parity that the EPS and SPS bits in the Line Control Register

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_PARITY_BIT_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Parity Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the parity of the received character does not match the parity that the EPS and SPS bits in the Line Control Register

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_PARITY_BIT_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Parity Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the parity of the received character does not match the parity that the EPS and SPS bits in the Line Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: BE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break Error. This bit is set to 1 if a break condition was detected, indicating that the received data inout was held LOW for longer than a full-word transmission time( defined as start, data, parity and stop bits).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: BREAK_ERROR_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Break Error. This bit is set to 1 if a break condition was detected, indicating that the received data inout was held LOW for longer than a full-word transmission time( defined as start, data, parity and stop bits).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: BREAK_ERROR_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Break Error. This bit is set to 1 if a break condition was detected, indicating that the received data inout was held LOW for longer than a full-word transmission time( defined as start, data, parity and stop bits).

spirit:field.spirit:name: OE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error.This bit is set to 1 if data is received and the receive FIFO is already full.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OVERRUN_ERROR_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Overrun error.This bit is set to 1 if data is received and the receive FIFO is already full.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved

spirit:field.spirit:name: FE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the received character did not have a valid stop bit

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_STOP_BIT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When set to 1, it indicates that the received character did not have a valid stop bit

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_STOP_BIT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is cleared to 0 by a write to UARTECR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity Error. When set to 1, it indicates that the parity of the received character does not match the parity that the EPS and SPS bits in the Line Control Register

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INVALID_PARITY_BIT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When set to 1, it indicates that the parity of the received character does not match the parity that the EPS and SPS bits in the Line Control Register

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_PARITY_BIT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is cleared to 0 by a write to UARTECR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break Error. This bit is set to 1 if a break condition was detected, indicating that the received data inout was held LOW for longer than a full-word transmission time( defined as start, data, parity and stop bits).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: BREAK_ERROR
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is set to 1 if a break condition was detected, indicating that the received data inout was held LOW for longer than a full-word transmission time( defined as start, data, parity and stop bits).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_BREAK_ERROR
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is cleared to 0 by a write to UARTECR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error.This bit is set to 1 if data is received and the receive FIFO is already full.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OVERRUN_ERROR
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is set to 1 if data is received and the receive FIFO is already full.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_OVERRUN_ERROR
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: This bit is cleared to 0 by a write to UARTECR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, unpredictable when read

spirit:field.spirit:name: Clear_Errors
spirit:field.spirit:description: A write to this register clears the framing,parity, break and overrun errors.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: A write to this register clears the framing,parity, break and overrun errors.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CTS_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Clear to send. This bit is the complement of the UART clear to send, nUARTCTS, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTCTS is LOW.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CTS_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Clear to send. This bit is the complement of the UART clear to send, nUARTCTS, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTCTS is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect, nUARTDCD

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DSR_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect, nUARTDCD, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTDCD is LOW.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DSR_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect, nUARTDCD, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTDCD is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DCD_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect, nUARTDCD, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTDCD is LOW.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DCD_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data carrier detect. This bit is the complement of the UART data carrier detect, nUARTDCD, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTDCD is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BUSY
spirit:field.spirit:description: UART busy. If this bit is set to 1, the UART is busy transmitting data. This bit remains set until the complete byte, including all the stop bits, has been sent from the shift register.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: BUSY_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: UART busy. If this bit is set to 1, the UART is busy transmitting data. This bit remains set until the complete byte, including all the stop bits, has been sent from the shift register. This bit is set as soon as the transmit FIFO becomes non-empty, regardless of whether the UART is enabled or not.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: BUSY_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: UART busy. If this bit is set to 1, the UART is busy transmitting data. This bit remains set until the complete byte, including all the stop bits, has been sent from the shift register. This bit is set as soon as the transmit FIFO becomes non-empty, regardless of whether the UART is enabled or not.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXFE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive FIFO empty. The meaning of this bit depends on the state of the FEN bit in the UARTLCR_H Register. If the FIFO is disabled, this bit is set when the receive holding register is empty. If the FIFO is enabled, the RXFE bit is set when the receive FIFO is empty.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXFF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit FIFO full. The meaning of this bit depends on the state of the FEN bit in the UARTLCR_H Register. If the FIFO is disabled, this bit is set when the transmit holding register is full. If the FIFO is enabled, the TXFF bit is set when the transmit FIFO is full.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXFF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive FIFO full. The meaning of this bit depends on the state of the FEN bit in the UARTLCR_H Register. If the FIFO is disabled, this bit is set when the receive holding register is full. If the FIFO is enabled, the RXFF bit is set when the receive FIFO is full.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXFE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit FIFO empty. The meaning of this bit depends on the state of the FEN bit in the Line Control Register, UARTLCR_H on page 3-12. If the FIFO is disabled, this bit is set when the transmit holding register is empty. If the FIFO is enabled, the TXFE bit is set when the transmit FIFO is empty. This bit does not indicate if there is data in the transmit shift register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RI
spirit:field.spirit:description: Ring indicator. This bit is the complement of the UART ring indicator

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RI_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Ring indicator. This bit is the complement of the UART ring indicator, nUARTRI, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTRI is LOW.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RI_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Ring indicator. This bit is the complement of the UART ring indicator, nUARTRI, modem status input. That is, the bit is 1 when nUARTRI is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, do not modify, read as zero.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ILPDVSR
spirit:field.spirit:description: 8-bit low-power divisor value. These bits are cleared to 0 at reset.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BAUD_DIVINT
spirit:field.spirit:description: The integer baud rate divisor. These bits are cleared to 0 on reset.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BAUD_DIVFRAC
spirit:field.spirit:description: The fractional baud rate divisor.These bits are cleared to 0 on reset.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BRK
spirit:field.spirit:description: Send break

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_BREAK
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: For normal use, this bit must be cleared to 0.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SEND_BREAK
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = the UART is enabled. Data transmission and reception occurs for either UART signals or SIR signals depending on the setting of the SIREN bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: PEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity enable:

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: PARITY_DISABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = parity is disabled and no parity bit added to the data frame

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: PARITY_ENABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = parity checking and generation is enabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: EPS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Even parity select.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: ODD_PARITY
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = odd parity. The UART generates or checks for an odd number of 1s in the data and parity bits.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: EVEN_PARITY
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = even parity. The UART generates or checks for an even number of 1s in the data and parity bits.

spirit:field.spirit:name: STP2
spirit:field.spirit:description: Two stop bits select. If this bit is set to 1, two stop bits are transmitted at the end of the frame. The receive logic does not check for two stop bits being received.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enable FIFOs:

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_DISABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = FIFOs are disabled (character mode) that is, the FIFOs become 1-byte-deep holding registers

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_ENABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = transmit and receive FIFO buffers are enabled (FIFO mode).

spirit:field.spirit:name: WLEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Word length. These bits indicate the number of data bits transmitted or received in a frame as follows: b11 = 8 bits b10 = 7 bits b01 = 6 bits b00 = 5 bits.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: B11
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data bits transmitted or received = 8 bits

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: B10
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data bits transmitted or received = 7 bits

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: B01
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data bits transmitted or received = 6 bits

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: B00
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Data bits transmitted or received = 5 bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: SPS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Stick parity select.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TXD_PARITY_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: if the EPS bit is 0 then the parity bit is transmitted and checked as a 1

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TXD_PARITY_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: if the EPS bit is 1 then the parity bit is transmitted and checked as a 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, do not modify, read as zero.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: UART enable:

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: UART_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = UART is disabled. If the UART is disabled in the middle of transmission or reception, it completes the current character before stopping.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: UART_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = the UART is enabled. Data transmission and reception occurs for either UART signals or SIR signals depending on the setting of the SIREN bit

spirit:field.spirit:name: SIREN
spirit:field.spirit:description: SIR enable:

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SIR_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = IrDA SIR ENDEC is disabled. nSIROUT remains LOW (no light pulse generated), and signal transitions on SIRIN have no effect.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SIR_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = IrDA SIR ENDEC is enabled. Data is transmitted and received on nSIROUT and SIRIN. UARTTXD remains HIGH, in the marking state. Signal transitions on UARTRXD or modem status inputs have no effect.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SIRLP
spirit:field.spirit:description: SIR low-power IrDA mode. This bit selects the IrDA encoding mode. If this bit is cleared to 0, low-level bits are transmitted as an active high pulse with a width of 3/16th of the bit period. If this bit is set to 1, low-level bits are transmitted with a pulse width that is 3 times the period of the IrLPBaud16 input signal, regardless of the selected bit rate. Setting this bit uses less power, but might reduce transmission distances.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, do not modify, read as zero

spirit:field.spirit:name: LBE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Loopback enable. If this bit is set to 1 and the SIREN bit is set to 1 and the SIRTEST bit in the Test Control Register, UARTTCR on page 4-5 is set to 1, then the nSIROUT path is inverted, and fed through to the SIRIN path. The SIRTEST bit in the test register must be set to 1 to override the normal half-duplex SIR operation. This must be the requirement for accessing the test registers during normal operation, and SIRTEST must be cleared to 0 when loopback testing is finished. This feature reduces the amount of external coupling required during system test. If this bit is set to 1, and the SIRTEST bit is set to 0, the UARTTXD path is fed through to the UARTRXD path. In either SIR mode or UART mode, when this bit is set, the modem outputs are also fed through to the modem inputs. This bit is cleared to 0 on reset, to disable loopback.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit enable. If this bit is set to 1, the transmit section of the UART is enabled. Data transmission occurs for either UART signals, or SIR signals depending on the setting of the SIREN bit. When the UART is disabled in the middle of transmission, it completes the current character before stopping.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TX_ENABLE_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = If this bit is set to 1, the transmit section of the UART is enabled.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TX_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = If this bit is set to 0, the transmit section of the UART is diabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive enable. If this bit is set to 1, the receive section of the UART is enabled. Data reception occurs for either UART signals or SIR signals depending on the setting of the SIREN bit. When the UART is disabled in the middle of reception, it completes the current character before stopping.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RX_ENABLE_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 1 = If this bit is set to 1, the Receive section of the UART is enabled.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RX_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: 0 = If this bit is set to 0, the Receive section of the UART is disabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data transmit ready. This bit is the complement of the UART data transmit ready, nUARTDTR, modem status output. That is, when the bit is programmed to a 1 then nUARTDTR is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Request to send. This bit is the complement of the UART request to send, nUARTRTS, modem status output. That is, when the bit is programmed to a 1 then nUARTRTS is LOW.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Out1
spirit:field.spirit:description: This bit is the complement of the UART Out1 (nUARTOut1) modem status output. That is, when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0. For DTE this can be used as Data Carrier Detect (DCD).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OUT_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OUT_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: Out2
spirit:field.spirit:description: This bit is the complement of the UART Out2 (nUARTOut2) modem status output. That is, when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0. For DTE this can be used as Data Carrier Detect (DCD).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OUT2_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: OUT2_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: when the bit is programmed to a 1 the output is 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTSEn
spirit:field.spirit:description: RTS hardware flow control enable. If this bit is set to 1, RTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only requested when there is space in the receive FIFO for it to be received.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RTSEn_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: RTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only requested when there is space in the receive FIFO for it to be received.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: RTSEn_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: RTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only requested when there is space in the receive FIFO for it to be received.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTSEn
spirit:field.spirit:description: CTS hardware flow control enable. If this bit is set to 1, CTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only transmitted when the nUARTCTS signal is asserted.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CTSEn_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: CTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only transmitted when there is space in the receive FIFO for it to be received.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CTSEn_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: CTS hardware flow control is enabled. Data is only transmitted when there is space in the receive FIFO for it to be received.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXIFLSEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit interrupt FIFO level select. The trigger points for the transmit interrupt are as follows: b000 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/8 full b001 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/4 full b010 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/2 full b011 = Transmit FIFO becomes 3/4 full b100 = Transmit FIFO becomes 7/8 full b101-b111 = reserved.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b000
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b000 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/8 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b001
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b001 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/4 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b010
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b010 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/2 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b011
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b011 = Transmit FIFO becomes 3/4 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b100
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b100 = Transmit FIFO becomes 7/8 full

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXIFLSEL
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive interrupt FIFO level select. The trigger points for the receive interrupt are as follows: b000 = Receive FIFO becomes 1/8 full b001 = Receive FIFO becomes 1/4 full b010 = Receive FIFO becomes 1/2 full b011 = Receive FIFO becomes 3/4 full b100 = Receive FIFO becomes 7/8 full b101-b111 = reserved.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b000
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b000 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/8 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b001
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b001 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/4 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b010
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b010 = Transmit FIFO becomes 1/2 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b011
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b011 = Transmit FIFO becomes 3/4 full

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: b100
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: b100 = Transmit FIFO becomes 7/8 full

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, do not modify, read as zero.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RIMIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTRI modem interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTRIINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRIINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRIINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTSMIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTCTS modem interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTCTSINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the nUARTCTS interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the nUARTCTS interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCDMIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDCD modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTDCDINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the nUARTDCD interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the nUARTDCD interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSRMIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDSR modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTDSRINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTDSRINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTDSRINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTRXINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRXINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRXINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTTXINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTTXINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRXINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive timeout interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTRTINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRTINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTRTINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FEIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing error interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTFEINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTFEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTFEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PEIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: parity error interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTPEINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTPEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTPEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BEIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break error interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTBEINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTBEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTBEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OEIM
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error interrupt mask. A read returns the current mask for the UARTOEINTR interrupt.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SET_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTOEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: CLEAR_INTERRUPT
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: On a write of 1, the mask of the UARTOEINTR interrupt is set. A write of 0 clears the mask.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read as zero, do not modify.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RIRMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTRI modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTRIINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTSRMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTCTS modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTCTSINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCDRMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDCD modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTDCDINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSRRMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDSR modem interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTDSRINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXRIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTRXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXRIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTTXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTRIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive timeout interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTRTINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FERIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing error interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTFEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PERIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTPEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BERIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break error interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTBEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OERIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error interrupt status. Returns the raw interrupt state of the UARTOEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read as zero, do not modify.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RIMMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTRI modem masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTRIINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTSMMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTCTS modem masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTCTSINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCDMMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDCD modem masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTDCDINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSRMMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDSR modem masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTDSRINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTRXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTTXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive timeout masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTRTINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FEMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing error masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTFEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PEMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTPEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BEMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break error masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTBEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OEMIS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error masked interrupt status. Returns the masked interrupt state of the UARTOEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read as zero, do not modify.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RIMIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTRI modem interrupt clear. Clears the UARTRIINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CTSMIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTCTS modem interrupt clear. Clears the UARTCTSINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DCDMIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDCD modem interrupt clear. Clears the UARTDCDINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DSRMIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: nUARTDSR modem interrupt clear. Clears the UARTDSRINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive interrupt clear. Clears the UARTRXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit interrupt clear. Clears the UARTTXINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RTIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive timeout interrupt clear. Clears the UARTRTINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FEIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Framing error interrupt clear. Clears the UARTFEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: PEIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Parity error interrupt clear. Clears the UARTPEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BEIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Break error interrupt clear. Clears the UARTBEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: OEIC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Overrun error interrupt clear. Clears the UARTOEINTR interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read as zero, do not modify.

spirit:field.spirit:name: RXDMAE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Receive DMA enable. If this bit is set to 1, DMA for the receive FIFO is enabled.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_RECEIVE_ENABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 1, DMA for the receive FIFO is enabled.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_RECEIVE_DISABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 0, DMA for the receive FIFO is disabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TXDMAE
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transmit DMA enable. If this bit is set to 1, DMA for the transmit FIFO is enabled

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_TRANSMIT_ENABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 1, DMA for the transmit FIFO is enabled.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: FIFO_TRANSMIT_DISABLED
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 0, DMA for the transmit FIFO is disabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMAONERR
spirit:field.spirit:description: DMA on error. If this bit is set to 1, the DMA receive request outputs, UARTRXDMASREQ or UARTRXDMABREQ, are disabled when the UART error interrupt is asserted.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DMA_ERROR_1
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 1, the DMA receive request outputs

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DMA_ERROR_0
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: If this bit is set to 0, the DMA does not receive request outputs

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read as zero, do not modify.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UARTTCR
spirit:register.spirit:description: UARTTCR is the test control register. This genreal test register controls operation of the UART under test conditions.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ITEN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Integration test enable. When this bit is 1, the UART is placed in integration test mode, otherwise it is in normal operation.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: ITEN_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When this bit is 1, the UART is placed in integration test mode, otherwise it is in normal operation.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: INEN_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When this bit is 1, the UART is placed in integration test mode, otherwise it is in normal operation.

spirit:field.spirit:name: TESTFIFO
spirit:field.spirit:description: Test FIFO enable. When this bit it 1, a write to the Test Data Register, UARTTDR on page 4-8 writes data into the receive FIFO, and reads from the UARTTDR register reads data out of the transmit FIFO. When this bit is 0, data cannot be read directly from the transmit FIFO or written directly to the receive FIFO (normal operation). The reset value is 0.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TEST_FIFO_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When this bit it 1, a write to the Test Data Register, UARTTDR on page 4-8 writes data into the receive FIFO, and reads from the UARTTDR register reads data out of the transmit FIFO.

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: TEST_FIFO_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When this bit is 0, data cannot be read directly from the transmit FIFO or written directly to the receive FIFO (normal operation). The reset value is 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SIRTEST
spirit:field.spirit:description: SIR test enable. Setting this bit to 1 enables the receive data path during IrDA transmission (SIR full-duplex operation is only available when testing). This bit must be set to 1 to enable SIR system loopback testing, and you must also set the LBE bit to 1 in the Control Register, UARTCR Clearing this bit to 0 disables the receive logic when the SIR is transmitting (normal operation). This bit defaults to 0 for normal operation (half-duplex operation).

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SIR_FIFO_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Setting this bit to 1 enables the receive data path during IrDA transmission (SIR full-duplex operation is only available when testing). This bit must be set to 1 to enable SIR system loopback testing, and you must also set the LBE bit to 1 in the Control Register

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: SIR_FIFO_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: Clearing this bit to 0 disables the receive logic when the SIR is transmitting (normal operation). This bit defaults to 0 for normal operation (half-duplex operation).

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, unpredictable when read.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UARTITIP
spirit:register.spirit:description: UARTITIP is the integration test input read/set register. It is a a read/write register. In integration test mode it enables inputs to be both written to and read from. Table 4-3 lists the register bit assignments.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRXD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the UARTRXD primary input.

spirit:field.spirit:name: SIRIN
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the SIRIN primary input

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTDSR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the nUARTDSR primary input.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTCTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the nUARTCTS primary input.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTDCD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the nUARTDCD primary input.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTRI
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reads return the value of the nUARTRI primary input.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRXDMACLR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Writes to this bit specify the value to be driven on the intra-chip input, UARTRXDMACLR, in the integration test mode. Reads return the value of UARTRXDMACLR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTTXDMACLR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Writes to this bit specify the value to be driven on the intra-chip input, UARTTXDMACLR, in the integration test mode. Reads return the value of UARTTXDMACLR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, unpredictable when read

spirit:register.spirit:name: UARTITOP
spirit:register.spirit:description: UARTITOP is the integration test output read/set register. The primary outputs are read only and the intra-chip outputs are read/write. In integration test mode it enables outputs to be both written to and read from. Table 4-4 lists the register bit assignments.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTTXD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTTXD.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nSIROUT
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on nSIROUT.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTDTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on nUARTDTR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTRTS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on nUARTRTS.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTOut1
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on nUARTOut1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: nUARTOut2
spirit:field.spirit:description: Primary output. Writes specify the value to be driven on nUARTOut2.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTINTR. Reads return the value of UARTINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTEINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTEINTR. Reads return the value of UARTEINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRTINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTRTINTR. Reads return the value of UARTRTINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTTXINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTXTINTR. Reads return the value of UARTXTINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRXINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTRXINTR. Reads return the value of UARTRXINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTMSINTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTMSINTR. Reads return the value of UARTMSINTR at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRXDMABREQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTRXDMABREQ . Reads return the value of UARTRXDMABREQ at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTRXDMASREQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTRXDMASREQ . Reads return the value of UARTRXDMASREQ at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTTXDMABREQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTTXDMABREQ . Reads return the value of UARTTXDMABREQ at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTTXDMASREQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Intra-chip output. Writes specify the value to be driven on UARTTXDMASREQ. Reads return the value of UARTTXDMASREQ at the output of the test multiplexor.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UARTTDR
spirit:register.spirit:description: UARTTDR is the test data register. It enables data to be written into the receive FIFO and read out from the transmit FIFO for test purposes. This test function is enabled by the TESTFIFO bit in the Test Control Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DATA
spirit:field.spirit:description: When the TESTFIFO bit is set to 1, data is written into the receive FIFO and read out of the transmit FIFO

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DATA_ENABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When the TESTFIFO bit is set to 1, data is written into the receive FIFO and read out of the transmit FIFO

spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:name: DATA_DISABLE
spirit:enumeratedValue.spirit:description: When the TESTFIFO bit is set to 1, data is written into the receive FIFO and read out of the transmit FIFO

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, unpredictable when read

spirit:field.spirit:name: PartNumber0
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x11

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: PartNumber1
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x0

spirit:field.spirit:name: Designer0
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x1

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined, must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: Designer1
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x4

spirit:field.spirit:name: Revision
spirit:field.spirit:description: This field depends on the revision of the UART: r1p0 0x0 r1p1 0x1 r1p3 0x2 r1p4 0x2 r1p5 0x3

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined, must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: Configuration
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x00

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTPCellID0
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x0D

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTPCellID1
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0xF0

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTPCellID2
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0x05

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:field.spirit:name: UARTPCellID3
spirit:field.spirit:description: These bits read back as 0xB1

spirit:field.spirit:name: Reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reserved, read undefined must read as zeros

spirit:port.spirit:name: SCANENABLE
spirit:port.spirit:description: Scan enable signal for both clock domains

spirit:port.spirit:name: SCANINPCLK
spirit:port.spirit:description: Scan signal Input for PCLK domain

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTTXDMACLR
spirit:port.spirit:description: DMA request clear, asserted by the DMA controller to clear the transmit request signals. If DMA burst transfer is requested, the clear signal is asserted during the transfer of the last data in the burst

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTRXDMACLR
spirit:port.spirit:description: DMA request Clear, asserted by the DMA controller to clear the receive request signals. If the DMA burst transfer is requested, the clear signal is asserted during te transfer of the last data in the burst

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTMSINTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Uart receive modem status interrupt, active HIGH

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTINTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: A single combined interrupt generated as an OR function of the following interrupts: UARTMSINTR, UARTRXINTR, UARTTXINTR, UARTRTINTR, UARTEINTR

spirit:port.spirit:name: PRDATA
spirit:port.spirit:description: SubSet of unidirectional AMBA APB read data bus.

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTTXD
spirit:port.spirit:description: UART Transmitted Serial Data output. Defaults to high, The marking state, when reset

spirit:port.spirit:name: nSIROUT
spirit:port.spirit:description: SIR Transmitted Serial Data Output, active LOW. In the idle state, this signal remains LOW (the marking state). When this signal is HIGH, and infrared light pulse is generated that represents a logic 0(spacing state)

spirit:port.spirit:name: nUARTOut2
spirit:port.spirit:description: Modem status output, active LOW. Reset value is 0

spirit:port.spirit:name: nUARTOut1
spirit:port.spirit:description: modem status output, active LOW. Reset value is 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: nUARTRTS
spirit:port.spirit:description: Request to Send modem output, active LOW. The reset value is 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: nUARTDTR
spirit:port.spirit:description: Modem DTR modem status output, active LOW. The reset value is 0.

spirit:port.spirit:name: SCANOUTPCLK
spirit:port.spirit:description: UART output Scan Signal for the PCLK domain.

spirit:port.spirit:name: SCANOUTUCLK
spirit:port.spirit:description: UART output Scan Signal for the UARTCLK domain.

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTTXDMASREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: Transmit DMA single request, Active High

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTTXDMABREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: Transmit DMA burst request, Active HIGH

spirit:port.spirit:name: UARTRXDMASREQ
spirit:port.spirit:description: Receive DMA single request, active HIGH

spirit:fileSet.spirit:name: pl011_uart_synthesisable
spirit:fileSet.spirit:description: This is the RTL source for the PrimeCell Uart

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Uart is an Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture (AMBA) compliant System-on-Chip(SoC) peripheral that is developed, tested and licensed by ARM.
